localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Clubpad is a soundboard for your Clubhouse rooms 🔥 Show some love with applauses, drop the mic with a DJ horn, fill awkward silences with the jeopardy music, react to bad jokes with the rimshot, use the inception bwaaaaah to add drama, and other memes 📣
blogPost.body: Clubpad is a soundboard for your Clubhouse rooms 🔥 Show some love with applauses, drop the mic with a DJ horn, fill awkward silences with the jeopardy music, react to bad jokes with the rimshot, use the inception bwaaaaah to add drama, and other memes 📣
blogPost.title: clubpad - Reaction sounds for your Clubhouse rooms
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Clubpad是你的Clubhouse房间的声板 🔥用掌声来表达爱意，用DJ喇叭来丢掉麦克风，用危险音乐来填补尴尬的沉默，用Rimshot来回应不好的笑话，用inception bwaaaaah来增加戏剧性，以及其他备忘录📣。
Clubpad是你的Clubhouse房間的聲板 🔥用掌聲來表達愛意，用DJ喇叭來丟掉麥克風，用危險音樂來填補尷尬的沉默，用Rimshot來回應不好的笑話，用inception bwaaaaah來增加戲劇性，以及其他備忘錄📣。

previous.excerpt: Greg is a simple app that will coach you to grow healthy, happier plants. ⠀ Greg uses insights from plant physics to train machine learning algorithms so you know when to water each of your plants, in whichever environment they’re in.
previous.title: Greg 🌱 - Grow healthy and happier plants

localize.description: Greg是一款简单的应用程序，它将指导你种植健康、快乐的植物。⠀ Greg利用植物物理学的见解来训练机器学习算法，这样你就能知道什么时候给你的每一株植物浇水，无论它们在什么环境中。
localize.tagline: 种植健康和快乐的植物

localize.description: Greg是一款簡單的應用程序，它將指導你種植健康、快樂的植物。⠀ Greg利用植物物理學的見解來訓練機器學習算法，這樣你就能知道什麼時候給你的每一株植物澆水，無論它們在什麼環境中。
localize.tagline: 種植健康和快樂的植物

next.excerpt: We're excited to present a nice update of Bobby, the iPhone app that helps you keep track of your subscriptions. One of the often requested feature has now been added; Categories! You can now group subscriptions to categories in Bobby like Personal and Work.
next.title: Bobby 3.5 - Keep track of your subscriptions, now with categories

localize.description: 我们很高兴为您介绍Bobby的一个很好的更新，这个iPhone应用可以帮助您跟踪您的订阅情况。其中一个经常被要求的功能现在已经被添加了；分类！你现在可以在Bobby中把订阅的内容按照类别进行分组，比如说，你可以把订阅的内容按照类别进行分类。你现在可以在Bobby中对订阅进行分类，比如个人和工作。
localize.tagline: 跟踪您的订阅，现在有了分类。

localize.description: 我們很高興爲您介紹Bobby的一個很好的更新，這個iPhone應用可以幫助您跟蹤您的訂閱情況。其中一個經常被要求的功能現在已經被添加了；分類！你現在可以在Bobby中把訂閱的內容按照類別進行分組，比如說，你可以把訂閱的內容按照類別進行分類。你現在可以在Bobby中對訂閱進行分類，比如個人和工作。
localize.tagline: 跟蹤您的訂閱，現在有了分類。
